subject: docs: create documentation system with TODO and HISTORY tracking
body:
- Create /docs directory for all project documentation
- Move existing documentation files to /docs
- Add /docs/TODO.md for active task management
- Add /docs/HISTORY.md for commit history tracking
- Update CLAUDE.md with mandatory documentation maintenance workflow

This system prevents repeated work across sessions by:
- Tracking active tasks in TODO.md
- Recording completed work with context in HISTORY.md
- Ensuring all docs (CLAUDE.md, README.md, tutorials) stay updated
title: create documentation system with TODO and HISTORY tracking
